ygData.messageBody:

> I think the hybrids do not even have the option.

Olny classes that use Int for mnan get reaserch. Thats Wizards, Magicians, Necromancers, Enchanters. All the
classes that use Wis for mana are lucky for all there spells can be bought. Bastards!


Saro
